tha-ap119:2.1: Otataṁ vitthataṁ → ogataṁ vitataṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); otataṁ vitataṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap119:2.2: suvicittavaṭaṁsakaṁ → suci cittaṁ papañcakaṁ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed); suvicittaṁ vaṭaṁsakaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap119:4.3: Pāṇabhūte → pāṇabhūnaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); pāṇabhūtaṁ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap119:6.4: caritaṁ → karitaṁ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed); kāritaṁ (si, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
